alert.note: Alert for Clay (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 7:03PM CDT until June 14 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Clay County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 703 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Corning, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Piggott, Corning, Chalk Bluff Natural Area, St. Francis, Pollard, McDougal, Saint Francis, Crockett, Hickoria, Rhyne, Twin Oaks, Palatka and Chalk Bluff Battlefield Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
